meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of judging someone or something.

examples.sentence: His [judgement] was clouded by his emotions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的判斷被情感所影響。

examples.sentence: She made her [judgement] after careful consideration.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在仔細考慮後做出了判斷。

examples.sentence: A fair [judgement] is crucial in any trial.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在任何審判中，公正的判決是至關重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who leads or directs others in a course or journey.

examples.sentence: The [guide] showed us the best places to visit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 導遊帶我們去見識最好玩的地方

examples.sentence: He used a map as a [guide] to navigate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用地圖作為指導來導航

examples.sentence: A good [guide] can make all the difference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一個好的導遊能帶來不同的體驗

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be engaged in physical or mental activity in order to achieve a result.

examples.sentence: She will [work] on her project tonight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她今晚將繼續進行她的項目。

examples.sentence: He needs to [work] harder to succeed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要更加努力地工作才能成功。

examples.sentence: They [work] together as a team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們作為一個團隊一起工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A book in which one keeps a daily record of events and experiences.

examples.sentence: She writes in her [diary] every night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她每天晚上在日記中寫下事情。

examples.sentence: His [diary] contains memories of his travels.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的日記記載了旅行的回憶。

examples.sentence: Keeping a [diary] helps her reflect on her day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 保持日記幫助她反思自己的一天。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Out into view; forward in place or time.

examples.sentence: They went [forth] to explore the wilderness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們前往探險荒野。

examples.sentence: The story goes [forth] from the beginning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 故事從頭開始展開。

examples.sentence: Come [forth], and share your ideas.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請出來，分享你的想法。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move something over the surface of something else.

examples.sentence: Make sure to [rub] the lotion into your skin.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保將乳液塗抹到你的皮膚上。

examples.sentence: He [rubbed] his hands together to warm them.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把雙手摩擦在一起以暖和它們。

examples.sentence: Don't forget to [rub] out the pencil marks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 別忘了把鉛筆痕跡擦掉。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A spoken or written representation or account of a person, object, or event.

examples.sentence: The [description] of the painting was quite vivid.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這幅畫的描述非常生動。

examples.sentence: Her [description] of the city made me want to visit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這座城市的描述讓我渴望造訪。

examples.sentence: Can you provide a detailed [description] of the incident?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能提供事件的詳細描述嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person in a novel, play, or movie.

examples.sentence: The main [character] of the story is very relatable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個故事的主要角色非常容易讓人產生共鳴。

examples.sentence: Each [character] has their own unique traits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個角色都有自己獨特的特點。

examples.sentence: She enjoyed developing her [character] for the play.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡為這部劇創造角色。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The moral or ethical quality of an individual.

examples.sentence: His [character] is defined by his honesty.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的品格由誠實所決定。

examples.sentence: Integrity is an essential part of good [character].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 誠信是良好品格的重要部分。

examples.sentence: Building [character] takes time and effort.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 建立品格需要時間和努力。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device that prints text or images onto paper.

examples.sentence: I need to buy a new [printer] for my home office.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要為我的家庭辦公室買一台新印表機

examples.sentence: The [printer] ran out of ink during the presentation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在報告中，印表機墨水用完了

examples.sentence: Make sure the [printer] is connected to the computer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保印表機已連接到電腦

meanings.meaning_en_US: A tropical fruit with a sweet flavor and a smooth skin.

examples.sentence: He enjoyed a refreshing [guava] drink.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他享用了一杯清爽的番石榴飲料

examples.sentence: The ripe [guava] fell from the tree.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 成熟的番石榴從樹上掉下來

examples.sentence: They made a dessert with [guavas].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們用番石榴做了一道甜點

meanings.meaning_en_US: A play that is performed on a stage, or a series of events that have a strong emotional impact.

examples.sentence: She loves watching [drama] series on television.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡看電視劇集。

examples.sentence: The [drama] unfolds with unexpected twists and turns.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部戲劇充滿了意想不到的曲折。

examples.sentence: He decided to study [drama] in college.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定在大學學習戲劇。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To direct a goal or purpose towards something.

examples.sentence: He aims [to become] a doctor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的目標是成為一名醫生。

examples.sentence: The project aims [to improve] education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目的目標是改善教育。

examples.sentence: They aim [for success] in their careers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的目標是在職業上取得成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having a taste similar to that of salt; seasoned with salt.

examples.sentence: The sea water is very [salty].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海水是非常鹹的。

examples.sentence: I prefer [salty] snacks over sweet ones.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡鹹的零食而不是甜的。

examples.sentence: He added too much salt, making the soup too [salty].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他加了太多鹽，讓湯變得太鹹了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person whose job is to cut hair, usually men's hair.

examples.sentence: He visited the [barber] for a haircut.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他去找理髮師剪髮。

examples.sentence: The [barber] gave him a stylish look.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 理髮師給了他一個時尚的造型。

examples.sentence: She watched the [barber] in action.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她觀看理髮師的工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of interacting, interrelated, or interdependent elements forming a complex whole.

examples.sentence: The solar [system] includes all planets and the sun.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽系包括所有行星和太陽

examples.sentence: We need to improve our management [system].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要改善管理系統

examples.sentence: The [system] of government was changed last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 去年的政府系統改變了

meanings.meaning_en_US: To act dishonestly in order to gain an advantage.

examples.sentence: He tried to [cheat] on the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試圖在考試中作弊。

examples.sentence: It's not right to [cheat] your friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 欺騙朋友是不對的。

examples.sentence: Many students [cheat] during tests.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多學生在考試中作弊。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Completely; in total.

examples.sentence: Altogether, we need ten more chairs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 總共，我們需要十把椅子。

examples.sentence: She was altogether surprised by the news.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對這個消息完全感到驚訝。

examples.sentence: The project was altogether successful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目完全成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A team game played on a field, where players use their feet to kick a ball into the opposing goal.

examples.sentence: They played [football] in the park every weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們每個週末都在公園裡踢足球。

examples.sentence: The championship [football] game was thrilling.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 冠軍足球賽非常令人激動。

examples.sentence: He is a huge fan of [football].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是足球的巨大粉絲。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A leader or ruler of a people or clan.

examples.sentence: The [chief] made an important announcement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 首領發表了一個重要公告。

examples.sentence: He is the [chief] of the tribe.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是這個部落的首領。

examples.sentence: The town's [chief] is well-respected.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個城鎮的領袖受到尊重。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To put down, especially gently or carefully.

examples.sentence: He decided to [lay] the book on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定把書放在桌上

examples.sentence: Please [lay] the blanket out for a picnic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把毛毯攤開以便野餐

examples.sentence: She will [lay] the foundation for the new project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將為新項目奠定基礎
